allData.occupation: Production Manager for high-end events and broadcasts

positions.title: Production Manager
positions.description:
- Coordinating the planning, staffing, and execution of virtual, live, and hybrid events and broadcasts.
- Coordinating between clients and technical staff to prepare for events, solve issues, and develop innovative solutions to bring the virtual event experience to a new level.
- Vetting and hiring technical talent for shows with critical labor needs.
- Assisting with planning research & development tasks in the company to optimize systems and constantly improve procedures.
- Creating design layouts, video, and image assets for client and internal use.
- Drafting floorplans and creating previsualization renders

positions.title: Live Event Technician
positions.description:
-Live event technician for corporate events, medical shows, concerts, museum installations and more.
-Operating video switching and video playback systems, as well as working closely with clients to make alterations to show content.
-Working with clients to efficiently and correctly construct set ups in varying time constraints.
-Assuring that content is displayed correctly and true to the creator's vision.
-Extensive work with IATSE Local One

positions.title: Director of Media Production
positions.description:
- Managed the creation and operation of a remote video production studio as well as a Video On Demand platform for Elements Barre + Wellness.
- Responsible for the creation of all creative content for Elements, including video production, graphic design for social media and print collateral, email marketing, and web updates.
- Create weekly social and marketing content, including social media posts & stories, marketing emails, postcards, and web updates.
- Created marketing funnel from web forms to CRM with associated email automations.
- Produce and direct video content for marketing and Video On Demand platform.
positions.locationName: New York, New York, United States

positions.title: Producer/Director
positions.description:
-Created over 30 live action and animated commercials, music videos, and promotional videos for a variety of businesses and artists throughout New York and New Jersey.
-Working with clients from conception to the final edit to bring their visions' to life and capture the heart and soul of the company.
-Utilizing content provided by the client as well as planning and executing live action shoots.

positions.title: Rental Technician
positions.description:
-Aid in the rental and maintenance of stage/film/video lighting, rigging, and power distribution systems.
-Assembling rental packages for clients and assuring that the correct equipment is pulled and tested prior to delivery.
-Repairing equipment as needed.

certifications.name: OSHA 10 Hour Outreach Training Program - General Industry
NYC DOB 4-Hr Supported Scaffold User Certificate
certifications.authority: New York City Department of Buildings

volunteerExperiences.description: I was part of the New Jersey SkillsUSA State Officer team from 2008-2010, serving first as Southern Regional President and then as State Vice President. SkillsUSA is an organization that trains the youth of today for the careers of tomorrow, as a state officer I helped facilitate statewide competitions for vocational students and promote educational causes.

allData.headline: Production Manager for high-end events and broadcasts
allData.summary:
What makes a great entertainment professional? Dedication, reliability, and the creativity to bring vision to reality. With over a decade of professional experience working hands on with corporate event production, content creation, and marketing, I will be able to bring your corporate events or internal content to the next level. From initial planning to the big screen, I can assist in every step of the process, telling the story of your company and making the most out of the presentation medium.

I thoroughly believe in going the extra mile for satisfaction, and with dual experience in both content production and practical live event production I will be able to coordinate with both the event planners to create striking, eye-catching content, as well as the technical directors on the production to assure they have what they need for smooth playback as well as how to best utilize their set up. Whether it be a streaming, a video wall, or a 120’ projection surface, I will step out of the box to wow your audience!

I’ve created over 30 high quality commercials for a variety of businesses and organizations throughout New York and New Jersey. Spots include both live action and motion graphic commercials, and my goal is to make the production process as painless as possible for my clients. I firmly believe that through video, anything is possible, and when you have me on your project, you can rest assured that I will bring your vision to life!
